name: DevSetup
description: A web app that lets you select your favorite developer tools and instantly generates the terminal installation script for your stack. Perfect for quick, repeatable setups.

name: Repeto
description: A curated platform for CSE students to discover high-quality scholarships, internships, and hackathons. Stay ahead in your academic and professional journey.

name: Project Archive
description: A collaborative hub where colleges can showcase, fork, and share student projects. Inspires juniors and helps preserve academic innovation.

name: NearbyHostel
description: A smart hostel and PG management platform for colleges. Students can discover, rate, and review nearby hostels and paying guests with real feedback.

name: Project Collab
description: A collaboration platform for college students to work together on projects, share ideas, and build innovative solutions as a team.

name: Student App
description: A comprehensive app for college students featuring course management, study resources, campus events, and productivity toolsâ€”all in one place.

name: DriveToWebsite
description: Turn your Google Drive folders into a live website. Instantly publish and share study materials or resources with your college community.

name: Academic Drive
description: A specialized version of DriveToWebsite focused on sharing and organizing study materials for colleges. Easy access to notes, assignments, and resources.

name: GithubRepoExplorer
description: A tool for exploring and visualizing GitHub repositories. Understand project structures, dependencies, and contributions at a glance.
